#summary DTGen release compatibility.

= Introduction =

 * An Oracle database requires an operating system (i.e. Windows, Linux, OS X etc...).
 * DTGen requires an Oracle database (i.e. Oracle 10gXE, Oracle 11gEE, etc...).
 * The DTGen GUI requires Oracle's Application Express installed in an Oracle database and a web browser (i.e. Internet Explorer, Firefox, Chrome, etc).

= Minimum Requirements =

|| *Operating System* || *Examples* ||
|| Any^1^ || Windows, Linux, OS X ||

|| *Database* || *Database<br>Edition* || *APEX<br>Vers* ||
|| Oracle10g || Any^2^ || 4.0 ||

|| *Browser* || *Vers^3^* ||
|| Microsoft Internet Explorer || 7.0 ||
|| Mozilla Firefox || 3.5 ||
|| Google Chrome || 4.0 ||
|| Apple Safari || 4.0 ||

Note ^1^: Any Operating Systems that runs the needed Oracle database.<br>
Note ^2^: Oracle Express Edition does not support Materialized View Logs<br>
Note ^3^: To view or develop Oracle Application Express applications, Web browsers must support Java Script and the HTML 4.0 and CSS 1.0 standards.
